title: Are all seven steps of the scientific method used in every scientific investigation? - Quora

response.answer_text: Any question asking “What are the X of anything?” is bogus. Someone may generate a list of, say, steps in doing research, or causes of the War of 1812 for purposes of organizing information and presenting it, but anyone who thinks those are the only possible ways to break down the information knows nothing about the subject, as you clearly do not.
